venue.name: Dilboy VFW Hall in Davis Square

item.description:
Mark Manson Returns To Boston For One Night Only!

World renown dating coach, professional blogger and two times author Mark Manson will be giving a talk on his unique take on the dating game and meeting your perfect match.

Attraction Through Honesty

Since 2007, Mark has traveled around the world speaking and helping thousands of men and women with their dating issues. His first book, Models: Attract Women Through Honesty, has sold thousands of copies worldwide and garnered dozens of perfect reviews without the benefit of any media publicity or major publisher. His second book, Escape Plan, a guide to traveling the globe, has done even better.

Mark himself is a graduate of Boston University. He’s been traveling the world for the past four years and has visited almost 50 countries. He speaks three languages and a little bit of a fourth. He is currently living in Sao Paulo, Brazil with his girlfriend.

In his book Models, he promotes a kind of communication between men and women that defies the default relationship logic ingrained in us since childhood that ultimately dooms us to failure. Mark's perspective on dating argues that trying to impress others and "win" over a new partner is ultimately self-defeating, and that we should use the knowledge of our emotional needs and personalities to find suitable partners.

 

The talk will include discussions on:

- Vulnerability and why it's the key to attraction.

- How to discover if you're being needy or not and how this is sabotaging your relationships.

- How to express yourself more openly without turning people off or upsetting others.

- How to cope with the anxiety and over-thinking that often accompanies dating.

- Why men are "jerks" and women are "crazy", and how to stop the cycle.

- Neediness and how it infiltrates all dysfunctional relationships.

- Why honesty is sexy and is always a winning strategy in the long-term.

- Sexual shame and how it permeates our culture; how to get rid of it.

- Living the relationship you want instead of chasing it.

- And much more...

You can read some of Mark's articles on his blog, Postmasculine.com, which has over 150,000 readers and hundreds of articles on dating. A good article for women is Can Women Make The First Move and a good article for men is Why It's So Hard.

THE DETAILS:

Important: Please Read!
- You MUST RSVP ASAP because this talk WILL fill up.
- Space is very limited and there is only enough space for 25 people from this group.
- First come, first served.
- No guests for this event, sorry. Group members only.
- Do NOT double RSVP in another group, you will be taking a space from someone else!
- There will be a waiting list in case another group doesn't fill up so I can move spots from to group.
- If you are on the waiting list and you get a spot, take it seriously and show up! Otherwise, you're taking a spot from someone else!
- If you RSVP and chance plans, change your RSVP!
- No-shows will be marked as such on Meetup.

Date & Time:
Monday, April 8th, 2013 -- 7:00 PM - 10:00 PM

Location:
George Dilboy VFW Hall Post #529
371 Summer Street
Somerville, MA 02144

Entrance:
Enter through the back door accessible from the parking lot. See map below.

Cover:
There is a $10 charge for this talk. Please have a $10 bill ready, come prepared.

Venue Rules:
The VFW says NO drinks permitted, PERIOD. Except for coffee, coffee is fine. Absolutely NO water bottles either! There will be a water cooler for water.

Attendance will be marked for this event, no shows will be marked as no-shows on Meetup.

GETTING THERE:

Mass Transit: Take the Red Line to Davis Square. Exit the T and make your way to Elm Street. Walk 1 block. Pass Downtown Wine & Spirits. After that, bear to the left for Summer Street. The Dilboy is half a block from Downtown Wine & Spirits.

Driving: There is a parking lot behind the VFW that you can park in. If the lot is full, you can find on-street parking. There is even a very small lot across from the Rosebud Bar & Grill where you might be able to find a spot.

 

See you there.

~Matt Adams
item.how_to_find_us: Read the details at the bottom of the post for this information.
item.name: Attraction Through Honesty - World Renown Dating Coach Mark Manson Speaks!
